message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and high-quality materials, it's truly a remarkable item. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $99. This is an excellent chance to experience the product before it's available to the general public at a higher price. I believe you'll find its capabilities to be well worth the investment. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this special offer.
